description:
Yet Another Clan Mech adds a collection of Clan mechs to YetAnotherMechlab. These include IIC variants which are based on the vanilla models as well as a growing selection of Omnimechs based on the MWO models (thanks to Paulleonard) and the Savage Wolf by offai500.

Additionally the Clans are introduced as a new faction starting in 3049, a single faction for now, no individual clans. Clan mechs will only spawn in missions against the Clans.

Uses weapons and equipment from YetAnotherWeaponClan (a very small number of special variants use some equipment from YetAnotherEquipmentCollection but there is no hard requirement).

New Variants of IS 'mechs:
- Annihilator C
- Annihilator C2
- Locust LCT-C
- Rifleman RFL-C
- Rifleman RFL-C3

Clan IIC variants (using their IS counterpart's model):
- Commando IIC

- Conjurer (aka Hellhound aka Wolverine IIC) 1
- Conjurer 3
- Conjurer 8

- Dervish IIC

- Griffin IIC GRF-IIC-1
- Griffin IIC GRF-IIC-2
- Griffin IIC GRF-IIC-3

author: cszolee79 and trueg
